name: ShiftSouth (Pty) Ltd
description: Operator of an online platform intended to offer on-demand and regular home cleaning services. The company's platform presents users with a convenient way to book home cleaning, gardening and pool cleaning, heavy lifting, fixing and maintenance, and commercial sanitation services online from a phone, tablet, or computer, enabling clients to find suitable pre-vetted professionals in minutes.
one_liner: Operator of an online platform intended to offer on-demand and regular home cleaning services. The company's platform presents users with a convenient way to book home cleaning, gardening and pool cleaning, heavy lifting, fixing and maintenance, and commercial sanitation services online from a phone, tablet, or computer, enabling clients to find suitable pre-vetted professionals in minutes.
